news.title: New pieces added to playlist
news.body: Please check the audioplaylist - you will find new recordings of pieces, that haven't been there yet.

news.title: New Website launched!
news.body: I am happy to announce that I am online now!

news.title: Opus X finished
news.body: A new opus for large ensemble received its final barlines.

news.title: Premiere of my new song cycle 'Paris forever'
news.body: Sarah Hiller, alto, and JB Floyd, piano
